response.original_title: A Guide To Dance For Adult Children
response.overview: Itâ€™s an experimental journey through the lens of VHS home movies, delving into childhood memories, highlighting dance not only as a tool of expression but also as a manifestation of existence. It plays around with imagination and fiction, reclaiming agency and power for seven-year-old Sadaf and her classmates.
response.title: A Guide To Dance For Adult Children
